overview: Don is from Santa Barbara, CA, and has lived in Nashville since 1995. For 10 years he worked at Griffin Technology, a leading developer and manufacturer of computer and iOS accessories. While at Griffin he was responsible for the creation of their R&D department, and worked in product development and project management on their most successful products such as the iTrip FM transmitter for iPods and the iBeam (selected in 2004 by Time Magazine as one of the “coolest gadgets of the year”). He specializes in hardware development and design, PCB layout, and project management, and has a very long background in pro cinematography/videography, pro photography, mountain biking, robotics, sound recording and reinforcement, optics, medical and military electronics, and a boatload more.
